backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a script marketplace with user profiles, script CRUD operations, search/filter functionality, and role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the Rawly41 Store application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the application's design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, Apple touch icon configuration, and mobile web app settings for home screen installation.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and theme colors for Rawly41 Store progressive web app installation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, script detail, and my scripts pages, wrapped with ThemeProvider and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Route protection component that redirects unauthenticated users to home page and displays loading spinner during authentication initialization.
frontend/src/components/CodeBlock.tsx: Code display component with syntax highlighting, copy-to-clipboard functionality, and hover-revealed copy button with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header containing Rawly41 logo, navigation links for authenticated users, login button, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling for duplicate authentication, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to enter their name, with form validation and loading state management.
frontend/src/components/ScriptCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying script metadata (title, description, category, author, date) with hover effects and navigation to detail page.
frontend/src/components/ScriptGrid.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of script cards with loading skeletons and an empty state when no scripts are found.
frontend/src/components/ScriptSearch.tsx: Provides a search input with debouncing and category filter dropdown, with a clear button to reset filters.
frontend/src/components/ScriptSubmission: Form component for submitting new scripts with fields for title, description, category, and content, using mutation hooks to create scripts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating scripts and user profiles, including search, filter, create, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using HSL values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main page displaying a hero banner, script search/filter interface, submission form for authenticated users, and a grid of scripts based on search/filter criteria.
frontend/src/pages/MyScriptsPage.tsx: Displays and manages the authenticated user's submitted scripts with edit and delete functionality, including a dialog form for editing script details (title, description, category, content) and an alert dialog for deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ScriptDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed view of a single script with syntax-highlighted code, metadata (author, dates, category), and delete functionality for script authors using an alert dialog confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the design system with OKLCH color variables, custom theme extensions (fonts, shadows, animations), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking implemented features including homepage script browsing, search/filtering, authentication with Internet Identity, dark theme styling, and rebranding to 'Rawly41 Store' with custom logo and PWA manifest requirements.
